channel.title: Talk-to npc aint working!?!?!
channel.description: the first click npc case aint working for some reason. When i click on an npc that worked yesterday and opened a shop, today it wont open it. Yesterday the wise old man had a dialogue when you talked to him, now today nothing. And it isn't the shops with the problem because my shops emote opens up shops for you and they all work. Something is wrong if anyone has an idea i would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: Talk-to npc aint working!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

ya im sure nothing changed in it, idk why it wont work anymore and someone else is having the same problem its not only me.

The beginning looks like dis

case 155: //first Click npc int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000); int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; faceNPC(NPCSlot); boolean FishingGo = false; boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
And after that is all the npcs with shops and stuff.
